great

A true classic. This is the fourth time I have bought this game and played it through and through. Yes its just a basic linear fps game for most people nowadays, but it really was ahead of its time back then. Back when Valve made games. Although tbh valve bought studios that made games.

If you have never played this, seriously, what are u waiting for. It very cheap nowadays so I don't think its too much to ask for to experience a true great classic.

Plus it is moddable to a point, so it depends on how much work you are willing to do for modding. From simple to overhauls, its all in your choice.

9/10. Wake up, smell the ashes...

This game takes everything you know and love about the Half-Life universe and expands it. I am really surprised by how many callbacks there are to the previous Half-Life games, making the storytelling in this episode very effective. At this time, Episode Two is the farthest the Half-Life story has been taken in this form by Valve. Since the originally planned trilogy never happened, I can see why devoted fans feel torn. Play this game if you want everything you loved about Half-Life to come to a climax that gently leaves a footprint in your heart. I also encourage those who have played Episode Two to remain hopeful as we remember the words of the G-Man: "Prepare for unforeseen consequences..." Game on.
10/10 - Its some of the best Half-Life you can play. When 3?

It's nice, but Episode 2 (Two).

The Half Life binge is done
Now to await Alyx.

This episode is way better than the first, it not only continues the greatness of Half-Life 2 but builds on it. There are a bunch of new enemies such as acid antlions and hunters. The environments in this episode are more open than the first one. In the later parts of this one you use the car which is a lot of fun (or not, depending on what you like). There were a lot of fun parts such as defending the Vortigaunts when they are healing Alyx or protecting the base from the striders. This game also had a lot of funny lines. The story is also developed a lot in this episode, you learn about a lot of new stuff that changes the Half-Life series. The only problem I have with this is not with the game itself, but, why is there no episode 3!! This episode ends on a frightening cliffhanger and we learn so much yet there is no episode 3, so sad. Aside from that this is a fantastic game, I love it just as much as Half-Life 2 [b] 10/10 [/b]
This game was an exciting follow up to Half-Life 2 Episode 1, and it ends on a cliffhanger that leaves you positively overjoyed and ready for part 3

Infelizmente não temos o terceiro jogo. Quem sabe com Alyx agora eles não pensem em fazer a continuação. Eu zerei o Half Life 1 em 2000, o 2 ano retrasado e as continuações agora e sinto o mesmo do que aqueles que estão esperando a 14 anos por uma continuação kkkk
The last moments are so intense and then you get slapped in the face at the very end. I finally understand why people are are so desperate for another game.
